name: Dog Collar
notes: Needed for companion upgrade. Do not recycle until training is complete.

name: ARC Alloy
uses: Explosives/Medical/Utility Station I unlocks; Projects I ×80
notes: Common mid-tier crafting material; keep a healthy stock early game.

name: ARC Powercell
notes: Foundational power item; non-recyclable but used in multiple stations.

name: Advanced Electrical Components
uses: Gear Bench III ×5; Utility Station III ×5; Project IV ×5
notes: Gate for higher bench tiers; hold until upgrades complete.

name: Antiseptic
uses: Medical Lab III ×8; Quest: Doctor’s Orders ×2
notes: Bench and quest item; recycle only after upgrades.

name: ARC Thermo Lining
notes: High-value fabric yield; safe to recycle when surplus.
